About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Le Minh Triet - 1996

I want to become a Front-End Developer. I study coding in online courses (Udemy, Coursera) and make some small projects by myself. During my learning, I realize that gaining actual experience is the best way to improve faster in this major! I am looking for web development jobs, especially Front-End Web Development. I am willing to learn!

University

I get bachelor of engineering degree in Industrial Engineering at CTU. In my graduate thesis, I use IBM's CPLEX software to code and solve an optimization problem. That is my first coding experience!

Work

In early 2019, I worked for a tech start-up company in HCMC. My responsibility is drawing car models by AdobeXD and entry data to a web application. During that time, I start to have interests in web development.

Self-taught

In late 2019, I decided to quit my job to focus on study to become a developer. After 4 month, I have studied basic HTML5, CSS3, vanilla JAVASCRIPT, SASS preprocessor, BootStrap 4 framework, Jquery library, Git version control.

My ability
